page.title: 07Damar Fashions,Tiptree
page.content: Damar Fashions is one of four shops in a block.They are all owned by Mr.Jel. It is along Church Road near Factory Corner.Damar Fashions itself is a fashion clothes shop,but also sells records,albums and cassettes.The lady who partly owns it,is called Mary Epsom.The mangeress is my mum,called Eira Cursons.We went to visit Damar Fashions to ask some questions.The questions were;How long have you worked here? "Nine years"What is the most popular thing you sell,clothes wise? "Jeans,if we have any comments they are mostly nice."We looked at prices on some of the clothes,we thought they were good value.A customer told us,she likes to buy fashionable clothes and spends an average of twentyfive pounds.
